thread.title: 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival
thread.title_full: 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival

title: 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival
text:
> Entertainment 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival Anya Taylor-Joy poses for photographers upon arrival at the London Film Festival Awards, at Banqueting House in central London, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
